room_title: Escape room "Haunted Hotel" by Great Escape Mystery Rooms in Fort Smith
room_description:
You’ve booked a nice getaway at a historic hotel. Your group is informed upon arrival that there is only one room left, room 13! They tell you that it is a wonderful room; however, there have been rumors that the room is haunted.
Some people even claim their friends and family have vanished after staying in the room. Those are of course just rumors, no truth to them whatsoever! Rest assured: it is one of our nicest rooms… we guarantee you will never want to leave!
